description.original: The plugin helps you to see the number of notes under each folder within the file explorer.
description.translation: The plugin helps you to see the number of notes under each folder within the file explorer.

dict..setDesc('Turn on this option if you wan: .setDesc('Turn on this option if you want to see the number of notes even after you expand the collapsed folders')
dict..setDesc('By default, there is no root f:
.setDesc('By default, there is no root folder provided by Obsidian. It is moved to drop-down menu to switch between vaults. ' +
            'Enable this option if you want to see root folder and its count in the file explorer')
dict..setDesc('Turn off this option to choose: .setDesc('Turn off this option to choose file that should be counted')
dict..setDesc('Turn on this option to use Fil: .setDesc('Turn on this option to use Filter List to exclude files')
dict..setPlaceholder('Leave it empty to count: .setPlaceholder('Leave it empty to count all types of files')
dict..appendText('Extension list to include/e: .appendText('Extension list to include/exclude file during counting')
